ygData.subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
ygData.msgSnippet: Horn Drill dodged the ice, he prided himself on dodging. Gigas was hit by the fireballs. Kracken: So be it. Kracken fired 2 missiles at Necromancer. Horn Drill

Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster

From: "SOULSTICE" <thecode@...>

Horn Drill dodged the ice, he prided himself on dodging. Gigas was hit by
the fireballs.

Kracken: So be it.

Kracken fired 2 missiles at Necromancer. Horn Drill fired 2 horn drills
(wahaha) at Necromancer. Gigas used the Exploder, a flurry of fireballs, and
hurled the exploding fireballs at Necromancer. Grenade fired his
flamethrower at Necromancer. Beholder 2 fired 4 shots at Necromancer...

----- Original Message -----
From: <cyberwolf4@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 9:43 PM
Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster


> Necromancer looked on in satisfaction as Mobster seperated. He fired
> three ice blasts at Horn drill, then switched the setting and fired a
> fireball at Gigas.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Mobster had seperated right before the blast was fired, so it
> sailed over
> > the Mob's head not making a scratch.
> >
> > Horn Drill: So...we won?
> >
> > Kracken: I don't think so...not yet...
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 11:33 PM
> > Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> >
> >
> > > Necromancer fealt the tail strike Mobster, he couldn't see him
> but the
> > > attack let him know where his target was. he opened his mouth and
> fired an
> > > ice blast at Mobster. In order to keep his opponent from
> targeting him he
> > > transformed back to his robot mode and fired a laser blast into
> the smoke
> > at
> > > the gestault.
> > >
> > >
> > > ----- Original Message -----

> > >
> > > > Mobster couldn't see because of the smokescreen, so he
> retracted his
> > > blade.
> > > > Mobster took a swing but found himself struck upside the head by
> > > > Necromancer's tail. He was losing his patience...
> > > >
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > > Sent: Thursday, January 11, 2001 10:15 AM

> > > >
> > > >
> > > > > Mobsters blade slashed across Necromancers shoulder absorbing
> a
> > portion
> > > of
> > > > > his strength. Necromancer swung his other claw at the wrist
> holding
> > the
> > > > > sabre. he released a smokescreen from his nostrils to blind
> Mobsters
> > > > optics.
> > > > > The mighty dragon concluded his attack by swinging his tail
> into the
> > > smoke
> > > > > at the distracted bot.
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > ----- Original Message -----

> > > > > > Mobster laughed. Gigas took control and switched to FIre
> Gigas,
> > mode.
> > > (I
> > > > > > didn't just make that up, in Secret of Mana there is a Fire
> Gigas)
> > The
> > > > > fire
> > > > > > did little damage.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Mobster: I master in element defense. MOON SABRE!
> > > > > >
> > > > > > A yellow blade came from his wrist. It absorbed energy when
> it
> > touched
> > > > an
> > > > > > enemy. Mobster ran forward and swung it at Necromancer...
> > > > > >
> > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > > > > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > > > > Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2001 10:16 AM

> > > > > > > Necromancer screamed in pain as the flamethrower struck
> his head,
> > he
> > > > > > placed
> > > > > > > his claws over his face trying to cover up the pain,
> flying back
> > > about
> > > > > > > thirty feet and came to a sudden stop.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > "HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" He mocked as he uncoveredhis face to
> show that
> > no
> > > > > damage
> > > > > > > had been inflicted. "You're trying to hurt me with fire?"
> the
> > dragon
> > > > had
> > > > > a
> > > > > > > grin ear to pointy ear, "I master the elements and you're
> trying
> > to
> > > > hurt
> > > > > > me
> > > > > > > with fire!"  He couldn't help laughing at the desperate
> move his
> > > > > opponent
> > > > > > > had just made. "
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Necromancers eyes began to glow, smoke rose from his
> nostrils.
> > "Let
> > > me
> > > > > > show
> > > > > > > you just how well I master it." The great dragon opened
> his mouth
> > > and
> > > > > > > launched an inferno of white flame at the alliance bot.
